metadata.title: CVE-2022-0934 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
A single-byte, non-arbitrary write/use-after-free flaw was found in dnsmasq. This flaw allows an attacker who sends a crafted packet processed by dnsmasq, potentially causing a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0934` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsmasq - 2.86-1.1ubuntu1
dnsmasq-base - 2.86-1.1ubuntu1
dnsmasq-base-lua - 2.86-1.1ubuntu1
dnsmasq-utils - 2.86-1.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dnsmasq package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.86-1.1ubuntu1').
